main event: Two city officials in Oklahoma City witnessed a bright, disc-shaped object moving rapidly overhead at an estimated speed of 500 mph on September 7, 1962.
interesting points: The object was round, disc-shaped and about 20-25 feet in diameter, glowing with a whitish light.
The object was observed at an elevation of about 2000 feet and was watched for about a minute as it moved west.
Both officials observed the object and felt it was an unusual observation worth reporting.
No significant effect or evidence was left behind, other than their account.
The city official who reported the case felt it warranted further investigative attention.
sighted object: a round, disc-shaped object about 20-25 feet in diameter, glowing with a whitish light
